meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>epidemic</kanji> of <kanji>sick</kanji>ness is going to come from an <vocabulary>infectious disease</vocabulary>. Perhaps a <vocabulary>plague</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>epidemic</vocabulary> of some kind?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
